content.title: Import the Web App
content.body:
1. After the app is imported, a Iris dialog appears.
    Click Ok.
  2. From the main menu of the Iris, navigate to Project > Open > HCL Reference Architecture, and select RecipientsWeb.
    The application opens in the Storyboard view.
  3. From the top of the Iris canvas, from the drop-down list, select Web:1380.
